00007 W.dxul.listbox = function(node){var self = this;
00008     this.tagName = 'listbox';
00009     // set Attributes and Properties common to all XUL elements
00010     this.init(node);
00011     // construct presentation objects
00012     W.style(this.body, 'height:200px;overflow:auto;border:2px;borderStyle:inset;');
00013     this.core = W.style('table', 'width:100%;');
00014     // pool of row entries
00015     this.trs = [];
00016     // add item
00017     this.appendItem = function(caption, id){
00018         var tr = self.core.insertRow(-1);
00019         W.style(tr, 'width:100%;cursor:default');
00020         self.trs[self.trs.length] = tr;
00021         tr.onmousedown = function(){
00022             for(var i = 0; i < self.trs.length; ++i)
00023                 W.style(self.trs[i], 'color:black;background:;');
00024             this.style.color = 'white';
00025             this.style.background = 'navy';
00026         };
00027         var td = tr.insertCell(-1);
00028         td.appendChild(document.createTextNode(caption));
00029     };
00030 };
